# Troubleshoot BMad Configuration

## Purpose
Diagnose and fix common BMad configuration issues including missing files, incorrect paths, or validation errors.

## When to Use
BMad isn't working correctly or throwing configuration errors.

## Related Agent
`@setup-bmad-master`

## What This Does
- Validates all config files exist and are properly formatted
- Checks directory structure matches expected layout
- Verifies user configuration variables
- Tests workflow manifest integrity
- Identifies and reports specific configuration problems
- Suggests fixes for each issue found

## Expected Outcome
BMad configuration validated and corrected with actionable error reports.
